subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Quickscript Manual
msgSnippet: The difficulty with converting to a text document is the display of the QS characters.  Unless the reader has a QS font loaded, the  display will be
messageBody:
The difficulty with converting to a text document is the display of the QS characters.  Unless the reader has a QS font loaded, the  display will be gobbledegook.

Moira



Tel: +353 (0)87 621 4532  eFax: +44 (0)1892 800020  Websites

My profiles:
Contact me: moirajaneob moirajane
Latest tweet: Interesting Webinar on After Effects #MoviolaWebinars Follow @MOBPhoto Reply Retweet   18:35 Sep-13
Want a signature like mine? CLICK HERE.  


On 15 September 2012 19:36, Ryan <FeatherySquid@...> wrote:
 

Hi all... I've had a pdf of the Quickscript Manual for over a decade, and it looks like that's the same one that is still circulating today.

I was wondering if anyone has ever converted it to a normal text document for easier publication on the web, eBooks, etc? Or are there copyright issues there that I'm not aware of?
